metadata.feature_description: Configure template-specific settings like name, description, keywords, and URL

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Template creation form UI displays correctly

steps.action: Navigate to Content > Pages and select a page
steps.expected: Page list should display with action buttons
steps.actual: Page list displayed with 'Save Page Template' button visible

steps.expected: Template creation form should open with Name and Description fields
steps.actual: Template creation form opened with Template Name (required) and Description fields

steps.action: Enter template name 'Products Page Template' in the Template Name field
steps.expected: Template name should be accepted and Save button should become enabled
steps.actual: Template name was entered successfully and Save button became enabled

steps.action: Enter description 'A template based on the Our Products page for testing template settings.'
steps.expected: Description should be entered in the textarea
steps.actual: Description was entered successfully in the Description textarea

steps.action: Open template creation form without entering template name
steps.expected: Save button should be disabled when template name is empty
steps.actual: Save button was disabled when template name field was empty, demonstrating required field validation

steps.action: Enter template name in the required field
steps.expected: Save button should become enabled after entering template name
steps.actual: Save button became enabled after entering 'Products Page Template'

steps.action: Fill template name and description, then click Save
steps.expected: Template should be saved and appear in the templates list
steps.actual: Server returned 500 Internal Server Error. Error message displayed: 'There was an error retrieving your content. Please check your internet connection.'

issues: Template save operation fails with 500 Internal Server Error
Multiple attempts on different pages (Home, Our Products) all resulted in server errors (400 or 500)
The feature UI works correctly but the backend SavePageDetails API endpoint fails

steps.action: Attempt to access Page Templates without any saved templates
steps.expected: System should display appropriate message when no templates exist
steps.actual: System displayed message: 'You must save an existing page as a template prior to create a new template'

steps.action: Observe validation behavior when required field is empty
steps.expected: Save button should be disabled and validation should prevent submission
steps.actual: Save button remained disabled when Template Name was empty, preventing invalid form submission

observations: Code suggests 'keywords' field exists in the Template model (templatesCreateManager.js line 57), but no Keywords UI field is visible in the template creation form. Keywords may be inherited from page/portal settings rather than configured per-template.
The 'Set template keywords for SEO' scenario from suggested tests cannot be tested as no Keywords field exists in the template settings UI.
The 'Validate duplicate template names' scenario cannot be tested because template creation fails with server errors before any validation can occur.
Template creation workflow requires: 1) Navigate to Pages section, 2) Select a page, 3) Click 'Save Page Template' > 'Evoq Page Template', 4) Fill form and save.
The SavePageDetails API endpoint (TemplatesController.cs line 95) appears to have a server-side issue causing 500 errors.
Code shows validation for script injection prevention (hasScript rule in templatesCreateManager.js) but this could not be tested due to save failures.
